title: Overall [0â€“4]
stimulusHtml:
4 Discusses both works and mentions at least one relevant nineteenth-century idea about labor and one about landscape for each work.

3 Discusses both works and mentions at least one relevant nineteenth-century idea about labor and one about landscape for each work, but the essay contains a significant error, or discussion is less clear than a 4.

OR

Discusses both works and mentions at least one relevant nineteenth-century idea about labor and landscape for one work and labor or landscape for the other. Discussion is less full than a 4.

2 Discusses both works and contains at least two relevant ideas about labor or landscape for one of them. Discussion, compared to a 3, is unbalanced. There are errors.

OR

Discusses only one work, but includes at least one relevant idea about landscape and one about labor.

Note: a score of 2 is the highest score for an essay that discusses only one of the works.

1 Discusses one or both works sketchily, with no clear link to issues of labor or landscape. Answer is mostly description and/or contains significant errors.

0 Makes an attempt, but the answer is without merit because it rewrites the question or makes only incorrect statements. A nonresponse, crossed-out words, notes on summer vacations or teachers, etc.
descriptions: Makes an attempt, but the answer is without merit because it rewrites the question or makes only incorrect statements. A nonresponse, crossed-out words, notes on summer vacations or teachers, etc.
Discusses one or both works sketchily, with no clear link to issues of labor or landscape. Answer is mostly description and/or contains significant errors.

Discusses both works and contains at least two relevant ideas about labor or landscape for one of them. Discussion, compared to a 3, is unbalanced. There are errors.

OR

Discusses only one work, but includes at least one relevant idea about landscape and one about labor.

Discusses both works and mentions at least one relevant nineteenth-century idea about labor and one about landscape for each work, but the essay contains a significant error, or discussion is less clear than a 4.

OR

Discusses both works and mentions at least one relevant nineteenth-century idea about labor and landscape for one work and labor or landscape for the other. Discussion is less full than a 4.
Discusses both works and mentions at least one relevant nineteenth-century idea about labor and one about landscape for each work.
